name: Frog Uprising
description:
Welcome to Frog Uprising! How long can you resist?

Vanish waves of enemies by matching the colors!

CONTROLS:

W/A/S/D - CHANGE DIRECTION

J - RED PROJECTILE (works againts red enemies)

K - BLUE PROJECTILE (works againts blue enemies)

RULES:

You have 3 lives. If you shoot a wrong projectile at a enemy, you still get the points but you lose 1 life. If an enemy touches you, you losse ALL your lives. Good Luck!

CREDITS:

Coding and Art made by nearlyjames

Made in Godot Engine
